messages.subject: Re: SHQ banner+Rkdreams
messages.msgSnippet: Yup! Got it working now (not in RK dreams though)... By the way maybe it would be better if the banners were clickable so that they can go directly to the
messages.messageBody:
Yup! Got it working now (not in RK dreams though)... By the way maybe
it would be better if the banners were "clickable" so that they can
go directly to the sites... I'm kind of in a hurry but if you can do
that, it would be great.... Thanks Tiffany!

messages.subject: Re: SHQ banner+Rkdreams
messages.msgSnippet: Grace, I saw Barbara s sig at RKdreams and noticed the link had br inserted in it for some weird reason. Shinsengumihq.com banner
messages.messageBody:
Grace, I saw Barbara's sig at RKdreams and noticed the link had "br"
inserted in it for some weird reason.

Shinsengumihq.com banner
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/shqbutton.jpg

Shinsengumimb.com banner
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/1mbbutton.jpg

***I had to say put the SHQ banner on the left and SHQMB on the right
because rkdreams has dimension guidelines for signatures because they
may take up too much space...but if you put them right next to each
other everything is perfect :)

messages.subject: Re: +Rkdreams
messages.msgSnippet: Ezboard did post a message today about some technical problems do to their server upgrade...basically the html for the logout page is messed up, the thread
messages.messageBody:
Ezboard did post a message today about some technical problems do to
their server upgrade...basically the html for the logout page is
messed up, the thread settings such as moving new posts up to the top
isn't working so I have to go through the forums and do some double
checking.

Sometimes the links on the bottom of the page are all broken sometimes
they work...I took the time to compile those links in the footer so
people can surf those references simultaneously while browsing the board.

don't you just love technology?

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, spiritus saitou <spiritus_saitou@y...> wrote:
> I'm not having any problems with RK Dreams, but I'm having problems
with shinsengumimb taking *forever* to load a page, sometimes timing
out or immediately telling me the page isn't available, then finally
loading as soon as I retry. A few days ago (before they shut down for
maintenance), it wouldn't even let me log on. Weird...
>
> phil

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: +Rkdreams
messages.msgSnippet: I m not having any problems with RK Dreams, but I m having problems with shinsengumimb taking *forever* to load a page, sometimes timing out or immediately
messages.messageBody:
I'm not having any problems with RK Dreams, but I'm having problems with shinsengumimb taking *forever* to load a page, sometimes timing out or immediately telling me the page isn't available, then finally loading as soon as I retry. A few days ago (before they shut down for maintenance), it wouldn't even let me log on. Weird...

phil

messages.subject: Re: SHQ banner+Rkdreams
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Tiffany, I ll probably join rkdreams... Wouldn t it be great, people will immediately know we belong to the same group just by the flag... Excellent idea...
messages.messageBody:
Hi Tiffany,

I'll probably join rkdreams... Wouldn't it be great, people will
immediately know we belong to the same group just by the flag...
Excellent idea...

By the way... I hope this doesn't just apply to rkdreams... Would it
be okay if I used this also in other forums that I frequent? It would
be good exposure to the group. I'm a member of several anime,
streamload, pocketpc and tech forums.

I tried it on one site already the first banner is working but the
one for the Shinsengumi Message board is not... Do you have any ideas?

Oh if you want me to take it off. Let me know... :)

messages.subject: SHQ banner+Rkdreams
messages.msgSnippet: I made a banner for SHQ.com to use in my sig at rkdreams...the screencap  of the flag is from http://www.jag.cx/Kenshin/ (I emailed the owner of the site to
messages.messageBody:
I made a banner for SHQ.com to use in my sig at rkdreams...the
screencap of the flag is from http://www.jag.cx/Kenshin/ (I emailed
the owner of the site to inform him/her)
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/shqbutton.jpg

So if any of you are joining rkdreams in the future you can add this
to your sig:
[img]http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/shqbutton.jpg%5b/img][img]http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/1mbbutton.jpg%5b/img]
the banners look better with the Shinsengumihq.com banner on the left
and the Shinsengumimb.com banner on the right so the images kind of
sandwich the webaddresses

If any of you become part of the rkdreams community I highly recommend
that you conduct patrols in groups and arm yourself to the
teeth...from the background color of the site (skillfully set to
replicate the Battousai's hair) we can draw logical conclusions on
their political stance. I noticed that many threads discuss fanfic
which has become part of our canon so writers who feel
underappreciated will be able to eavesdrop on fans there.

---------------------------------
Fun Site
http://hikarikat.com/sher/Saitoh/
